description: The teacher asks the ClassPulse Assistant to send a homework reminder to all students in a specific class. The assistant confirms the request, invokes the notification_sender tool to deliver the message, receives confirmation, and informs the teacher that the reminder was sent successfully.

messages.content: You are ClassPulse Assistant, an intelligent tool for teachers that can manage attendance, grades, curriculum mapping, lesson adjustments, sentiment analysis, and send notifications to students, parents, or teachers.
Please send a reminder to all students in 7A_math to complete Homework 3 on the class portal by Friday.
Sure! I’ll send a reminder to every student enrolled in 7A_math about Homework 3. One moment while I dispatch the notification.

arguments.message: Reminder: Please complete Homework 3 on the class portal by this Friday.

messages.content: {"status": "success", "sent_to": 28, "detail": "Reminder sent to all 28 students in class 7A_math."}
The reminder has been sent to all 28 students in 7A_math. Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like to do.
